author: The Critical Drinker
description:
Join me, MauLer, Az and Fringy as we round out our epic Firefly coverage by watching and talking about Serenity, the movie that brings the story of Firefly to an end. If you've got a copy of your own, then have it ready to go and we can all watch together. Shiny!

Want to see what MauLer and I have been working on recently? Here's an advance look at our new Kickstarter campaign: https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/trialbyfiredrake/trial-by-fire-1/description
title: Drinker's Happy Hour - Serenity (Live Watch Party!)
